document.full_text: companies using the internet to do business should adhere to a code of conduct to reduce hacking and online theft, the commerce department said in a report issued on wednesday.
document.title: u.s. urges code of conduct for internet commerce
lines_and_colors: companies using the internet to do business should adhere to a code of conduct to reduce hacking and online theft, the commerce department said in a report issued on wednesday.
